function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited mandate on public health for the EU","Impact":"Complicated 'European' response to COVID-19","Mitigation":"Enhance coordination and cooperation among Member States","Technologies":"Information sharing and crisis response mechanisms","People":"European citizens, Member States","Owner":"EU Council, European External Action Service"},{"Description":"Political and economic debates about financial recovery instruments","Impact":"Obstacle to coordinated response to COVID-19","Mitigation":"Facilitate consensus-building and compromise among Member States","Technologies":"Negotiation and diplomatic communication strategies","People":"EU policymakers, Member States","Owner":"EU Council, European Commission"},{"Description":"Member States' political opportunism complicating response to COVID-19","Impact":"Risk of disjointed and inconsistent approaches to handling the pandemic","Mitigation":"Encourage collaborative and cooperative decision-making","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms and crisis management tools","People":"European citizens, Member States","Owner":"National governments, EU policymakers"}]}
